name: foundryvtt-drag-all-to-hotbar
description: Drag anything to Hotbar: Journals, RollTables, Actors, Items, Sounds, Playlist.

scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist && cp ./drag-all-to-hotbar.js dist/ && cp ./README.md dist/ && cp ./CHANGELOG.md dist/ && cp ./LICENSE.md dist/ && cp ./module.json dist/ && cp ./THANKS.txt dist/
scripts.copyWin: mkdir dist && copy module.json dist && copy drag-all-to-hotbar.js dist && copy README.md dist && copy CHANGELOG.md dist && copy LICENSE.md dist && copy module.json dist && copy THANKS.txt dist

author: JeansenVaars (Saif Ellafi)
